login: SELECT surname FROM user WHERE email=? AND password=?
isApplicant: SELECT a_id FROM applicant WHERE u_id=(SELECT u_id FROM user WHERE email=?)
showApplicantProfile: SELECT * FROM user JOIN applicant ON user.u_id = applicant.u_id WHERE email=?
showRecruiterProfile: SELECT * FROM user JOIN recruiter ON user.u_id = recruiter.u_id WHERE email=?
registerApplicant: INSERT INTO applicant (entrydate,subject,specialization,sallery,u_id) VALUES(?,?,?,?,(SELECT u_id FROM user WHERE email=?))
registerRecruiter: INSERT INTO recruiter (position,enterprise, u_id) VALUES(?,?,(SELECT u_id FROM user WHERE email=?))
changeApplicantProfile: UPDATE user JOIN applicant ON user.u_id = applicant.u_id SET name=?, surname=?, email=?, birthday=?, entrydate=?, subject=?, specialization=?, sallery=?, password=? WHERE user.u_id=?
changeRecruiterProfile: UPDATE user JOIN recruiter ON user.u_id = recruiter.u_id SET name=?, surname=?, email=?, birthday=?, enterprise=?, position=?, password=? WHERE user.u_id=?
insertSkills: INSERT INTO skills (java, javaScript, cPlusPlus, python, html, word, excel, powerpoint, git, jira, german, english, spanish, french, chinese, a_id) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
isSkillAvailable: SELECT a_id FROM skills WHERE a_id=?
updateSkills: UPDATE skills JOIN applicant ON applicant.a_id = skills.a_id SET java=?, javaScript=?, cPlusPlus=?, python=?, html=?, word=?, excel=?, powerpoint=?, git=?, jira=?, german=?, english=?, spanish=?, french=?, chinese=? WHERE applicant.a_id=?
showSkills: SELECT * FROM skills JOIN applicant ON applicant.a_id = skills.a_id WHERE skills.a_id=?
searchApp: SELECT user.name, user.surname, user.email, user.birthday, applicant.entrydate, applicant.sallery, applicant.specialization, applicant.subject FROM user JOIN applicant ON user.u_id = applicant.u_id JOIN skills ON applicant.a_id = skills.a_id WHERE skills.java=1 AND skills.javaScript=1 AND skills.word=1 AND skills.excel=1
searchApplicant: SELECT user.name, user.surname, user.email, user.birthday, applicant.entrydate, applicant.sallery, applicant.specialization, applicant.subject FROM user JOIN applicant ON user.u_id = applicant.u_id JOIN skills ON applicant.a_id = skills.a_id WHERE
